title: Montreal Baroque Orchestra
text:
The Montreal Baroque Orchestra (French: Orchestre Baroque de Montréal) is an early music ensemble based in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. It was established in 1989 by conductor Joël Thiffault.


== Discography ==
Francesco Geminiani - Concertos grossos (1997) Harmonia Mundi - International distributor
Handel - Ouvertures (1999)
Naturally Handel (2008)
Marin Marais - Semele Overture er danses - Montréal Baroque - ATM Baroque (2006)
